backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining agents, leads, owners, follow-ups, user profiles, and self-registrations with authorization, approval, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries specifying affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for two implemented features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend React files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and CSS variable definitions implementing a light/dark OKLCH color system for global theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads fonts and mounts the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, protected routes, role checks, and dashboard access control using TanStack Router and backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgentRegist: Agent self‑registration dialog with form inputs, photo upload preview, validation, upload progress, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout that sets themed header, footer, and logout handling based on user role and profile.
Wraps children with a CSS class providing page-level theming variants.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Button that opens a prefilled WhatsApp message to a given contact.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout handling via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and modifying user profiles, roles, agents, and related entities through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus custom CSS variables defining a vibrant light/dark theme and page-level styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays themed access-denied screens with status-specific messages and a logout button.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed panels for overview, master data, agents, follow-ups, and export tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AgentDetailPage: Displays detailed information and performance metrics for a specific agent, loading agent and lead data by principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/AdminOve: Shows high-level system stats like leads, agents, revenue, and pending follow-ups, including a sales vs rent chart.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/AgentMan: Provides a management interface to review agents, update their status, create new agents, and navigate to agent details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/ExportCe: Offers CSV export functions for agents, leads, and owners using retrieved backend data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/GlobalFo: Displays all follow-ups grouped into pending, overdue, and completed, with tables and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/MasterDa: Provides CRUD management for leads and owners with tabbed forms and tables.
frontend/src/pages/agent/AgentDashboardP: Renders the agent dashboard with tabs for overview, follow-ups, and lead/owner management.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/AddLeadO: Allows agents to add leads or owners and view their assigned lists.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/AgentOve: Shows agent metrics including total leads, owners, and today's pending follow-ups.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/FollowUp: Lets agents create, edit, and view their follow-ups with status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, loads user and agent data, and routes users to onboarding or dashboards based on role and profile state.
frontend/src/runtimeEnv.ts: Sets up a runtime shim ensuring II_URL is available in process.env.
frontend/src/utils/downloads.ts: Utility functions to export data as CSV or Excel files using browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, radii, shadows, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including version, feature summaries, architectural notes, and known issues for the CRM system.
